name: Fishing Minigame (Jasbrela)
description:
This is my attempt to create a fishing minigame. I've used Stardew Valley's minigame as a reference and inspiration. I also tried to add some features and turn it into a fishing game. It is still in progress.

I made everything all by myself (arts + scripts), except for the character (https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-fishing-pixel-art-pack).

CONTROLS

MoveW, A, S, D  or ARROW KEYSControl your HookSPACE
